summary:
The Czech Republic, also called Czechia, is a country in Central Europe. It's known historically as Bohemia and is surrounded by Austria, Germany, Poland, and Slovakia. The capital is Prague, and other big cities include Brno and Ostrava.

The region was once a duchy and later became a kingdom. It was ruled by different empires over the centuries. After World War I, it became part of Czechoslovakia. In 1992, Czechoslovakia split into two countries: the Czech Republic and Slovakia. Today, the Czech Republic is a democratic country with a strong economy and is part of the European Union.
title: Czech Republic
